text: Trud Stadium is a sports venue in Arkhangelsk. It is the home arena of bandy club Vodnikhttp://www.rusbandy.ru/club/16/ and has hosted the Bandy World Championship twice. ==External links== * The stadium at rusbandy.ru ==References== Category:Bandy venues in Russia Category:Sport in Arkhangelsk Category:Bandy World Championships stadiums
title: Trud Stadium (Arkhangelsk)
